channel.title: Compiler on Archaic-Mage
channel.description: Recent content in Compiler on Archaic-Mage

item.title: Mini Java Compiler
item.author: sohasoham811@gmail.com (Soham Tripathy)
item.description: Jul-Nov 2022 | Built a fundamental compiler to parse, validate and generate IR for a miniature version of Java language. Adapted a few compiler optimization techniques to improve the execution speed by 1%-2%.

item.title: Program Analysis
item.author: sohasoham811@gmail.com (Soham Tripathy)
item.description: Jan-May 2023 | In this project, I build three major program analysis tools for a mini-java (qparjava) language whose grammar can be found here Alias Analysis: Alias analysis is a technique used in programming languages and compilers to determine if two or more pointers or references in a program can refer to the same memory location.
